# Pull Request Title

## Summary

Provide a concise but clear summary of the changes introduced in this PR.

> ##### Problem Explanation *(Delete if not applicable)*
> Provide a clear explanation of the issue you are addressing
> ##### Cause
> Describe what caused the issue
> ##### Solution
> Explain how the problem was fixed

## Type of Change

Select the type(s) of change that apply to this PR:

* [ ] **Bug fix** – A non-breaking change that fixes an issue
* [ ] **New feature** – A non-breaking change that adds new functionality
* [ ] **Breaking change** – A fix or feature that alters existing functionality in a non-backward-compatible way
* [ ] **Documentation update** – Changes related to documentation
* [ ] **Styling** – UI/UX or aesthetic improvements (CSS, component appearance)
* [ ] **Testing** – Adding or updating tests
* [ ] **Refactor** – Code improvements without changing behavior
* [ ] **Chore** – Maintenance, housekeeping, or build-related tasks

## Checklist

Before submitting this PR, ensure that the following checks have been completed:

* [ ] Check that the branch is pointing to the development environment
* [ ] Remove all `console.log`
* [ ] Check imports format
* [ ] Check variables destructure
* [ ] Documentation has been updated
* [ ] **Review** the entire pull request yourself before sending it to the reviewer
